extends Object

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    protected abstract void acceptFrame​(Frame frame)
    Executes the code linked to the given frame.
    void doRead()
    Performs the read action on sc.

    The convention is that both buffers are in write-mode before the call to doRead and after the call.
    void doWrite()
    Performs the write action on sc.

    The convention is that both buffers are in write-mode before the call to doWrite and after the call.
    private Comparator<Frame> frameComparator()
    Makes and returns a frame comparator which compare 2 types of frame :
    Download Frame and not Download Frame.
    This comparator make the Download Frames less important than others frames, in order to send faster messages.
    To conserve order in 2 Download Frames, the one which has been created first will be sent first.
    int getQueueSize()
    Retrieves the size of the sending frame's queue.
    protected InetSocketAddress getRemoteAddress()
    Retrieves the distant server address.
    abstract void log​(Level level, String msg)
    Logs a message.
    abstract void log​(Level level, String msg, Throwable thrw)
    Logs a message.
    private void processIn()
    Processes the content of bbin.

    The convention is that bbin is in write-mode before the call to process and after the call.
    protected void processOut()
    Try to fill bbout from the message queue.
    void queueMessage​(Frame frame)
    Adds a message to the message queue, tries to fill bbOut and updateInterestOps.
    private void silentlyClose()
    Closes the connection with the socketChannel.
    It does not throw exception if an I/O error occurs.
    private void updateInterestOps()
    Updates the interestOps of the key looking only at values of the boolean closed and of both ByteBuffers.

    The convention is that both buffers are in write-mode before the call to updateInterestOps and after the call.
    Also it is assumed that process has been be called just before updateInterestOps.

    • Context

  • Method Details

    • frameComparator

      private Comparator<Frame> frameComparator()
      Makes and returns a frame comparator which compare 2 types of frame :
      Download Frame and not Download Frame.
      This comparator make the Download Frames less important than others frames, in order to send faster messages.
      To conserve order in 2 Download Frames, the one which has been created first will be sent first.
      Returns:
      A frame comparator, making Download Frames less important.

    • updateInterestOps

      private void updateInterestOps()
      Updates the interestOps of the key looking only at values of the boolean closed and of both ByteBuffers.

      The convention is that both buffers are in write-mode before the call to updateInterestOps and after the call.
      Also it is assumed that process has been be called just before updateInterestOps.

    • silentlyClose

      private void silentlyClose()
      Closes the connection with the socketChannel.
      It does not throw exception if an I/O error occurs.

    • processIn

      private void processIn() throws IOException
      Processes the content of bbin.

      The convention is that bbin is in write-mode before the call to process and after the call.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • doRead

      public void doRead() throws IOException
      Performs the read action on sc.

      The convention is that both buffers are in write-mode before the call to doRead and after the call.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • processOut

      protected void processOut()
      Try to fill bbout from the message queue.

    • doWrite

      public void doWrite() throws IOException
      Performs the write action on sc.

      The convention is that both buffers are in write-mode before the call to doWrite and after the call.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • queueMessage

      public void queueMessage​(Frame frame)
      Adds a message to the message queue, tries to fill bbOut and updateInterestOps.
      Parameters:
      frame - The frame to add

    • getRemoteAddress

      protected InetSocketAddress getRemoteAddress() throws IOException
      Retrieves the distant server address.
      Returns:
      The InetSocketAddress to which this context is linked.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • acceptFrame

      protected abstract void acceptFrame​(Frame frame) throws IOException
      Executes the code linked to the given frame.
      Parameters:
      frame - The frame to which execute the code.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • log

      public abstract void log​(Level level, String msg)
      Logs a message.
      Parameters:
      level - One of the message level identifiers, e.g., SEVERE.
      msg - The string message (or a key in the message catalog).

    • log

      public abstract void log​(Level level, String msg, Throwable thrw)
      Logs a message.
      Parameters:
      level - One of the message level identifiers, e.g., SEVERE.
      msg - The string message (or a key in the message catalog).
      thrw - Throwable associated with log message.

    • getQueueSize

      public int getQueueSize()
      Retrieves the size of the sending frame's queue.
      Returns:
      The number of elements in the queue.
